SEARCH
程序包 hms.appointments

类 AppointmentScheduler

java.lang.Object
hms.appointments.AppointmentScheduler
public class AppointmentScheduler extends Object
Manages the scheduling of appointments in the healthcare management system. This singleton class provides methods to schedule, accept, decline, reschedule, and cancel appointments.

    • scheduleAppointment

      protected void scheduleAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Schedules a new appointment if the slot is available.
      参数:
      appointment - The appointment to be scheduled

      Accepts a pending appointment, moving it to the confirmed list.

      参数:

      protected void rescheduleAppointment(Appointment existingAppointment, Appointment newAppointment)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new slot.
      参数:
      existingAppointment - The existing appointment to be rescheduled
      newAppointment - The new appointment with updated time slot

    • cancelAppointment

      protected Appointment cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Cancels an appointment in a specific list.
      参数:
      appointment - The appointment to cancel
      返回:
      The canceled appointment if successful; otherwise null

    • isSlotAvailable

      protected boolean isSlotAvailable(Appointment appointment)
      Checks if a slot is available for a certain appointment.
      参数:
      appointment - The appointment to check availability for
      返回:
      true if the slot is available; otherwise false

    • isSlotAvailable

      protected boolean isSlotAvailable(Doctor doctor, Time time, Date date)
      Checks if a slot is available for a specific doctor at a specific time.
      参数:
      doctor - The ID of the doctor
      time - The date and time of the appointment
      返回:
      true if the slot is available; otherwise false

    • isSlotOccupied

      protected boolean isSlotOccupied(Doctor doctor, Time time, Date date)
      Checks if a specific time slot is occupied for a given doctor on a specific date.
      参数:
      doctor - the doctor for whom the slot is being checked
      time - the time slot to check
      date - the date to check
      返回:
      true if the slot is occupied, false otherwise

    • findAppointmentSlot

      protected boolean findAppointmentSlot(Time time, List<Appointment> appointments)
      Checks if an appointment exists for a specific time slot in the provided list of appointments.
      参数:
      time - the time slot to find
      appointments - the list of appointments to search through
      返回:
      true if the time slot is found, false otherwise
